Html:
sample.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<edmx:Edmx Version="4.0" xmlns:edmx="http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/ns/edmx">
<edmx:DataServices>
<Schema Namespace="MyNamespace" xmlns="http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/ns/edm">
  <EntityType Name="Employee" />
  <EntityType Name="Order" />
  <EntityContainer Name="Container">
    <Singleton Name="BigBoss" Type="MyNamespace.Employee" />
    <EntitySet Name="Orders" EntityType="MyNamespace.Order" />
  </EntityContainer>
</Schema>
</edmx:DataServices>
</edmx:Edmx>

If I try to read the above xml response data, it is undefined. But if I replace the same with the namespace "http://schemas.microsoft.com/ado/2007/06/edmx", I'm able to read the data.

Please let me know how I can use datajs to read and parse my sample xml.

Thanking You.
